list.en: Do you have my phone number?
Would you tell me your phone number?
list.cn: 你能告诉我你的电话号码吗?

list.en: Do you want his phone number?
Please tell me your telephone number.
list.cn: 请告诉我你的电话号码。

list.en: What is your phone number, please?
list.cn: 请问你的电话号码是多少?

list.en: Would you like my phone number?
How can I get hold of you?
You can reach me at this number.
list.cn: 你可以打这个号码找到我。

list.en: What number can I reach you?
Call me at three, three, three, six, one, four, five.
Please connect me with Mr Lee.
Hello, is this five? Five, three, four, seven, one? Nine.
list.cn: 喂，这是5号吗?五，三，四，七，一?九个。

list.en: I want to talk to Tom.
May I have your name, please?
Who do you want to speak with?
It's nice to hear from you.
Who do you want to talk to?
Who would you like to speak with?
Are you still on the line?
Could you hold a little longer?
Would you mind waiting for a few minutes?
Will you hold the line, please?
May I put you on hold?
I'll get back to you later.
I guess I have got to go.
I'll be off the phone in a minute.
Do you want to leave a message?
Shall I tell him you called?
list.cn: 要我告诉他您来过电话吗?

list.en: Why don't you try again in an hour?
list.cn: 你何不一小时后再打来?

list.en: Could you possibly ask him to call me back?
list.cn: 你能让他给我回个电话吗?
请问您的电话号码是多少?

list.en: Can I take a message for him?
Please tell her to call me back.
I'm afraid you've dialed the wrong number.
I must have dialed the wrong number.
I'm sorry that I have disturbed you.
Sorry, I think you have the wrong number.
list.cn: 对不起，我想你打错电话了。

list.en: Are you sure you dialed the right number?
list.cn: 你确定你拨的号码是对的吗?

list.en: He probably changed the number. I'm sorry I bothered you.
list.cn: 他可能换了电话号码。对不起，打扰你了。

list.en: I'll give her a buzz on an inside line if you like.
list.cn: 如果你愿意，我可以打内线给她。

list.en: It took me quite a long time getting to you.
list.cn: 我花了好长时间才找到你。

list.en: Could I have extension six? Seven, nine, please?
list.cn: 我可以接分机6吗?七，九，好吗?

list.en: The line s busy at the moment.
I keep calling her but it always busy.
list.cn: 我一直给她打电话，但总是占线。

list.en: I dialed her number but got a busy signal.
list.cn: 我拨了她的号码，但电话占线。

list.en: I tried to call him but the line was busy.
list.cn: 我试着给他打电话，但电话占线。

list.en: My cell phone was power off.
The cell phone is out of charge.
There was a lot of noise.
Aren't you off the phone yet?
Are you through with the phone?
Do you mind if I call first?
list.cn: 你介意我先打个电话吗?

list.en: Can you cut your call short?
You have been online all day.
